dict.string:
"${TM_RUBY:=ruby}" -r "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/bin/shelltokenize.rb" <<END svn = ENV['TM_SVN'] || "svn" puts %x{#{svn} update #{TextMate.selected_paths_for_shell}} END
# force TM to refresh the current file.. osascript &>/dev/null \ -e 'tell application "Dock" to activate' \ -e 'tell application "TextMate" to activate' &
